forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
